Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to environmentally preferable purchasing by city agencies, and by repealing and reenacting subdivision e of section 6-306 of such code concerning power-supply standards for computer products procured by city agencies, and by repealing subdivision e of section 6-317 of such code concerning a program to recognize certain city agency contractors in connection with packaging reduction guidelines
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Environmentally preferable purchasing by city agencies.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to agency purchasing of textiles, and to establish a task force to recommend legislation and policy for environmentally preferable purchasing, use and disposal of such textiles
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establish a task force to recommend legislation and policy for environmentally preferable purchasing, use and disposal of such textiles.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to environmentally preferable purchasing by city agencies, and by repealing and reenacting subdivision e of section 6-306 of such code concerning power-supply standards for computer products procured by city agencies, and by repealing subdivision e of section 6-317 of such code concerning a program to recognize certain city agency contractors in connection with packaging reduction guidelines
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Environmentally preferable purchasing by city agencies.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to agency purchasing of textiles, and to establish a task force to recommend legislation and policy for environmentally preferable purchasing, use and disposal of such textiles
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establish a task force to recommend legislation and policy for environmentally preferable purchasing, use and disposal of such textiles.
